actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to permit State and local officers and employees to engage in certain political campaign activities.

summary.text: Permits State and local officers and employees to be candidates for election if none of the candidates are to be nominated or elected representing a party any of whose candidates for Presidential elector received votes in the last preceding election at which the Presdiential electors were selected.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to permit State and local officers and employees to engage in certain political campaign activities.
